name: Food & Drink Duas
description: Duas for meals, drinks, and all food-related situations

duas.title: Before Eating or Drinking
duas.benefits: Seeking Allah's blessing on the food and protection from harm

duas.title: If You Forget to Say Bismillah
duas.english: In the name of Allah at its beginning and at its end.
duas.benefits: Making up for forgetting to say Bismillah at the start
duas.occasion: When you remember to say Bismillah during eating

duas.title: After Finishing Eating or Drinking
duas.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَطْعَمَنِي هَذَا وَرَزَقَنِيهِ مِنْ غَيْرِ حَوْلٍ مِنِّي وَلاَ قُوَّةٍ
duas.transliteration: Alhamdu lillahi alladhi at'amani hadha wa razaqaneehi min ghayri hawlin minni wa la quwwah
duas.english: All praise is for Allah, Who fed me this and provided it for me without any might nor power from myself.
duas.occasion: After finishing any meal or drink

duas.title: Simple After-Eating Dua
duas.benefits: Expressing gratitude to Allah for His provision

duas.title: When Invited to Eat
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَهُمْ فِيمَا رَزَقْتَهُمْ وَاغْفِرْ لَهُمْ وَارْحَمْهُمْ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma barik lahum feema razaqtahum waghfir lahum warhamhum
duas.english: O Allah, bless for them that which You have provided them, and forgive them and have mercy upon them.
duas.benefits: Blessing for the host and their family
duas.occasion: When eating at someone else's house

duas.title: When Breaking Fast
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ لَكَ صُمْتُ وَعَلَى رِزْقِكَ أَفْطَرْتُ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma laka sumtu wa 'ala rizqika aftart
duas.english: O Allah, for You I fasted and on Your provision I break my fast.
duas.benefits: Acknowledging Allah's favor in fasting and provision

duas.title: When Drinking Milk
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِيهِ وَزِدْنَا مِنْهُ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma barik lana feehi wa zidna minh
duas.english: O Allah, bless it for us and give us more of it.
duas.benefits: Seeking blessing and increase in beneficial provision

duas.title: When Drinking Water
duas.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي سَقَانَا عَذْباً فُرَاتاً بِرَحْمَتِهِ وَلَمْ يَجْعَلْهُ مِلْحاً أُجَاجاً بِذُنُوبِنَا
duas.transliteration: Alhamdu lillahi alladhi saqana 'adhban furatan birahmatih wa lam yaj'alhu milhan ujajan bidhunubina
duas.english: All praise is for Allah, Who gave us sweet, pleasant water to drink by His mercy and did not make it bitter and salty because of our sins.
duas.benefits: Gratitude for Allah's mercy in providing clean water

duas.title: When Eating Dates
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِيمَا رَزَقْتَنَا وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma barik lana feema razaqtana wa qina 'adhab an-nar
duas.english: O Allah, bless for us what You have provided us and save us from the punishment of the Fire.
duas.benefits: Seeking blessing and protection from Hellfire

duas.title: When Eating Honey
duas.english: O Allah, bless it for us.
duas.benefits: Seeking blessing in this healing food mentioned in Quran

duas.title: When Sharing Food
duas.arabic: كُلُوا بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَبَارَكَ اللَّهُ لَكُمْ
duas.transliteration: Kulu bismillahi wa baraka Allahu lakum
duas.english: Eat in the name of Allah, and may Allah bless it for you.
duas.benefits: Blessing for all who share the meal

duas.title: When Food is Insufficient
duas.english: O Allah, bless for us what You have provided us.
duas.benefits: Seeking blessing to make little food sufficient
duas.occasion: When food seems insufficient for everyone
